state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled lettuce. -= Bedroom =- You arrive in a bedroom. A standard one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a chest drawer. You make out a closed antique trunk. You can see a king-size bed. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the king-size bed. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
